alert.note: Alert for Okanogan Highlands; Okanogan Valley; Wenatchee Area; Western Okanogan County (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Spokane (Eastern Washington and Northern Idaho)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 24 at 1:46PM PST until December 26 at 10:00AM PST by NWS Spokane
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 1 PM MONDAY TO 10 AM PST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Snow accumulations between 1 and 4 inches. For the Methow Valley, snow accumulations between 3 and 7 inches. * WHERE...Nespelem, Number 1 Canyon, Wauconda, Sherman Pass, Number 2 Canyon, Disautel Pass, Boulder Creek Road, Omak, Tonasket, Oroville, Chelan, Conconully, Pangborn Airport, Cashmere, Republic, Highway 20 Wauconda Summit, Twisp, Wenatchee, Methow, Loup Loup Pass, Winthrop, Entiat, Okanogan, Mazama, Chesaw Road, Bridgeport, Inchelium, and Brewster. * WHEN...From 1 PM Monday to 10 AM PST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be difficult.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For the latest travel information in Washington, go to https://wsdot.wa.gov/travel

area.areaDesc: Okanogan Highlands; Okanogan Valley; Wenatchee Area; Western Okanogan County
